mapper.insert:
insert into admin_today_price (booth_id, food_id, price_date, price, special_price) VALUES
(#{item.boothId}, #{item.foodId}, #{item.priceDate}, #{item.price}, #{item.specialPrice}) ;
mapper.select: SELECT c.`name` AS booth_name, b.`name` AS food_name, a.`price`, a.`special_price` FROM `admin_today_price` a LEFT JOIN `admin_food` b ON b.id = a.`food_id` LEFT JOIN `admin_booth` c ON c.id = a.`booth_id` WHERE a.`price_date` > #{start} and #{end} > a.price_date
